biocontainers.name: trumicount
biocontainers.summary: For ngs experiments using unique molecular identifiers (umis), molecules that are lost entirely during sequencing cause under- estimation of the molecule count, and amplification artifacts like pcr chimeras cause over-estimation. trumicount corrects umi data for both types of errors, thus improving the accuracy of measured molecule counts considerably.

biotools.summary: Correctly counting absolute numbers of molecules using unique molecular identifiers.
